title: Allow changing behaviour of external tools toolstrip
author: farosch
body_snippet:
## Current Behavior
When clicking on a an external tools button in the menu strip it uses the currently selected machine in the connection tree.

## Possible Solution
Implement a settings option to chose weather to use the currently active connection tab or the selected connection in the connection tree.
